DOC.brief_summary: Is there a relationship between changes in motor evoked potential latency intraoperatively and post-operative changes in walking function in patients undergoing spinal decompression.
DOC.brief_title: Changes in Motor Latency During Spinal Decompression: Relationship to Outcomes
DOC.criteria: Central spinal stenosis Ability to ambulate prior to onset of symptoms Arthritis affecting walking ability (hip, knee or ankle). Diabetes Implanted pacemaker or other electrostimulator.
